data.message: Hey Em, it's me again. Just wanted to say I'm still totally 100% interested in becoming your bassist. I listen to MM2 every single day. Listening to So Much Better as we speak. I know your entire catalog, and I've even improvised some bass lines of my own to some of your songs. I would love to show them to you. I'd totally be willing to pay my own airfare and hotel to come to Detroit to show you what I can do. I'm confident I could become a permanent fixture in your lyrical mixture.

replies.message: Thank you. It's my dream to work for or with Em. He's my main influence musically. He has written an undeniable catalog that will withstand the test of time. I believe one day humans will look back on Eminem in the same way people today look at Shakespeare, Van Gogh, Michelangelo, DaVinci, Monet. He is an artist of the highest caliber.
Yes, I realize the gravity of that statement, and I stand behind it wholeheartedly.
